cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: Don't miss out on this free educational webinar hosted by Kentico and Kentico Gold partner SilverTech. Learn how put a stop to content chaos, re-gaining control of your content investments to accelerate your time to market.
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: Master multichannel management with Xperience by Kentico and SilverTech
cms.contentitemcommondata.ContentItemCommonDataVisualBuilderWidget:
{"editableAreas":[{"identifier":"main","sections":[{"identifier":"13a9edf7-6228-4340-8181-86806ed554cd","type":"CommunityPortal.SingleColumnSection","properties":{"layout":"Standard","layoutParsed":0,"paddingTop":"Large","paddingTopParsed":0,"paddingBottom":"Large","paddingBottomParsed":0,"backgroundColor":"White","backgroundColorParsed":1},"zones":[{"identifier":"657c486a-e584-435a-be46-06743484fc3f","widgets":[{"identifier":"8676d5e5-997c-41bb-b290-a3e7423ff6b2","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"07aa68e1-e48e-4acf-820f-399ac30002a8","properties":{"markdown":"We want to let you know about an upcoming webinar we're hosting with our gold partner, SilverTech as part of the [MarTech online conference](https://martech.org/conference/fall/agenda/#sessId-2740) this month.","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":""},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"aed36653-bf1d-4f16-bb9e-4f00e46591c6","markdownStyle":"bb543848-6055-4b20-a172-454707743028","markdownStyleParsed":"9009e71a-cfc8-40e2-b424-e36240cbe0e8","markdownCodeLanguage":"b47cff30-7d9d-4ffd-87da-9bab7842529e"}}]},{"identifier":"a0ced3f4-3644-4a71-9f38-dc8073cd79d4","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"3eb5cf5c-8ebd-4a5a-8aaa-3a7e4468f946","properties":{"markdown":"Date: September 24, 2024

Time: 11:35 AM (ET)

Location: [Virtual through the MarTech conference](https://martech.org/conference/fall/agenda/#sessId-2740)","markdownStyle":"Note","markdownStyleParsed":1,"markdownCodeLanguage":""},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"e0c3825a-b8d3-49e7-9532-701d45293380","markdownStyle":"b75112dd-f050-4300-9373-655621a46661","markdownStyleParsed":"8075494d-1b17-46fc-85e1-c6a9646861f3","markdownCodeLanguage":"7e9ddbc7-c260-422a-a6c0-6083e7ab578f"}}]},{"identifier":"6b3a63df-038e-4ab7-a663-38b9d8c8ccc7","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"5822dac9-a39d-4198-bae6-512e0f023dc3","properties":{"markdown":"This webinar will be hosted by Christina Baker. Digital Strategy Team Lead at SilverTech, and Sean Wright, Lead Product Evangelist at Kentico.

In today's fast-paced digital world, marketers often lose control of their content because it's not structured and spread across multiple platforms. This leads to poor brand marketing, messaging confusion, and subpar customer experience. That's where Xperience by Kentico steps in. 

Join us for an insightful webinar where we'll dive into the power of the Content Hub and its content modeling features. We'll show you how Xperience by Kentico can help you regain control of your messaging with advanced tools that allow you to create, organize, and manage your content. 

[Register now](https://martech.org/conference/fall/agenda/#sessId-2740) and we hope to see you there.","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":""},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"39250d1b-55cc-45cd-b1aa-2cdbbe19ab01","markdownStyle":"a899d781-ad0f-41c9-b6a1-9ddad3476a6e","markdownStyleParsed":"0461fec8-9901-40b2-8e1d-33f24299e1ac","markdownCodeLanguage":"8908d6a1-bdd4-4cbf-ba9e-2bb8fc3a0fe5"}}]}]}],"fieldIdentifiers":{"layout":"5c36dab8-1441-40ce-ad15-c2f70b18e8d3","layoutParsed":"63d4a60f-62a4-40ff-9c3b-38277a8915e8","paddingTop":"93ee1f03-9564-41b6-aea7-d1bcc8402d79","paddingTopParsed":"2879b6ed-3827-4e01-a6a9-921c605bd6f6","paddingBottom":"d3a53038-9f98-4929-88a8-e54599627e4e","paddingBottomParsed":"a1c50658-e643-4693-94c4-e958a78ef626","backgroundColor":"1130df92-610b-4aeb-91e2-73dbb62a5c7a","backgroundColorParsed":"7da4be53-33ce-4991-b935-471c57accfaf"}}]}]}
